text:
Hinana, I feel like I'm forgetting something,
do you know what it might be~?

I-I'm not sure but...
maybe homework...?

Huh~
Hinana, did you have homework~?

Make sure to pay attention in class
and do your homework properly...!

The important thing is that you can look back at
your notes and avoid forgetting! Give it a try!

Hmm~...
But I feel like I'll forget what I wrote in my notes~!
It seems like you're already forgetting...

...In your case,
forgetting about work would be a big problem.
